mapper.select: SELECT c.*, t.name AS teaName, t.img_url AS imgUrl, t.price AS price FROM t_cart c LEFT JOIN t_tea t ON c.tea_id = t.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM t_cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND tea_id = #{teaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cart (user_id, tea_id, count, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{teaId}, #{count}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE t_cart SET count = #{count} WHERE id = #{id}
